title: "Aula 03"

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
x <- c(1, 2, 3)
y <- seq(1:3)
x
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 1 2 3
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
y
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 1 2 3
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
x == y
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE TRUE TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
all(x == y)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
any(x == y)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
z <- c(3, 4, 5)
x
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 1 2 3
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
all( x == z)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] FALSE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
any(x == z)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] FALSE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
x
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 1 2 3
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
z
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 3 4 5
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
w <- c(3, 6, 7)
any(w == z)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
w == z
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1]  TRUE FALSE FALSE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
w[2]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 6
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
w
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 3 6 7
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
w[w == z]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 3
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
y[y %in% z]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 3
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
vetor_de_repeticao = rep(x, 3)
vetor_de_repeticao
```



```{.r .cell-code}
invisible(seq4 <- seq3[seq3 > 150])
print(seq4, seq4)
```


```{.r .cell-code}
print(seq4, seq4)
```

```
Error in print.default(seq4, seq4): invalid printing digits 170
```

```{.r .cell-code}
seq4
```

```{.r .cell-code}
paste("Hello World")
```

```

```


```{.r .cell-code}
vetor_character <- c("gato", " gato", 
                     "cachorro", "cachorro", 
                     "dinossauro", "arara",
                     "periquito ", 
                     "dinossauro", 
                     "bicho  preguiça")
length(vetor_character)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 9
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
unique(vetor_character)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "gato"            " gato"           "cachorro"        "dinossauro"     
[5] "arara"           "periquito "      "bicho  preguiça"
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
gsub(pattern = "^ ", 
     replacement = "", 
     x = vetor_character)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "gato"            "gato"            "cachorro"        "cachorro"       
[5] "dinossauro"      "arara"           "periquito "      "dinossauro"     
[9] "bicho  preguiça"
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
vetor_character = gsub(pattern = " $", 
     replacement = "", 
     x = vetor_character)

gsub(pattern = "^ ", 
     replacement = "", 
     x = vetor_character)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "gato"            "gato"            "cachorro"        "cachorro"       
[5] "dinossauro"      "arara"           "periquito"       "dinossauro"     
[9] "bicho  preguiça"
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
vetor_character = gsub(pattern = "^\\s+", 
     replacement = "", 
     x = vetor_character)


vetor_character = gsub(pattern = "\\s+", 
     replacement = " ", 
     x = vetor_character)


gsub(pattern = "a|i", 
     replacement = "---", 
     x = vetor_character)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "g---to"               "g---to"               "c---chorro"          
[4] "c---chorro"           "d---noss---uro"       "---r---r---"         
[7] "per---qu---to"        "d---noss---uro"       "b---cho pregu---ç---"
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
unique(vetor_character)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "gato"           "cachorro"       "dinossauro"     "arara"         
[5] "periquito"      "bicho preguiça"
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
table(vetor_character)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
vetor_character
         arara bicho preguiça       cachorro     dinossauro           gato 
             1              1              2              2              2 
     periquito 
             1 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
rev(vetor_character)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "bicho preguiça" "dinossauro"     "periquito"      "arara"         
[5] "dinossauro"     "cachorro"       "cachorro"       "gato"          
[9] "gato"          
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
rev(sort(vetor_character))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "periquito"      "gato"           "gato"           "dinossauro"    
[5] "dinossauro"     "cachorro"       "cachorro"       "bicho preguiça"
[9] "arara"         
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#####
plot(seq2, seq3, 
     pch = 16, 
     col = "red", 
     las = 1, 
     xlab = "Sequencia 2", 
     ylab = "Sequencia 3")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula_03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(seq2, log10(seq3), 
     pch = 16, 
     col = "red", 
     las = 1, 
     xlab = "Sequencia 2", 
     ylab = "Sequencia 3")
```

![](Aula_03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-2.png){width=672}
